mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STORE_INFOR s ( NAME , ADDRESS , ADDRESS_DETAIL , STORE_CATEGORY_NO , COMPANY_RESTRATION_NUMBER , BUSINESS_REGISTRATION_CERTIFICATE_IMG ) SELECT #{name} AS NAME, #{address} AS ADDRESS, #{addressDetail} AS ADDRESS_DETAIL, #{storeCategoryNo} AS STORE_CATEGORY_NO, m.company_registration_number AS COMPANY_REGISTRATION_NUMBER, #{businessRegistrationCertificateImg} AS BUSINESS_REGISTRATION_CERTIFICATE_IMG FROM MEMBER_STORE_OWNER m WHERE m.NO = #{no}
